Text: A similar film can also be found in google video.  Search for camilla aagestad

2. The "boyfriend" is 40+ and a social worker who should have been helping her
3. Much is filmed in secret (admitted in cort)
4. He has been harazing her for 6 month on phone and by wiki-bombing (admitted in cort)

6. He is also on trial for three acount of violence against her.

I don't want to be a part of that kind of violent shit, and hope my surfing-mates feel the same way.

We may be Pirates, but we have a codex.

Please help kill this clip.

Jeg har gjort mye dumt, noe som jeg så inderlig angrer på, men jeg skal ta den straff jeg evnt. måtte få. Det at mennesker med skylapper og manglende innsikt, som neverwere skal spe på historiene med flere løgner, synes jeg derimot bare er trist. Dette er en vond sak for alle involverte og er det noen som lurer på noe, så må dere heller spørre meg direkte.

Hm. when everyone talks about something I just have to see and judge for my self.. Almost nothing in this vid is possible to be filmed in secret... also I wanted to find out if there was some articles on the case on the net so I searched the web for "camilla aagestad -torrent -zuluzink" and only found one pic of someone by that name in risør, but that gal do not look anything like the one in the clip.. also the clip don't say anything about any boyfriend so I don't get that remark at all.. the clip simply states that she had sex with more than 30 guys during her "russetid"(well.. uh.. "rag-week" is not really an apt translation, but the closest possible fit.. it's something celebrated the entire last spring of school the last year before you can start uni).

either way, it's really poor vid. quality with too much cutting and the original sound removed from most of it. Not worth watching if u want something to get excited over. (very cute girl though)
